title: Mr. Wrong
description: Get in.Get some.Get out.What could go wrong?Everything.Everything can go wrong.Especially when the hot guy at the bar I went home with on a whim turns out to be the ridiculously sexy younger brother of Hollywood's leading man, Landon Trask--who also happens to be my new boss.In the blink of an eye, Lex McCleod goes from hot one-night stand to hostile housemate who seems hellbent on seeing me fail...when he isn't luring me into the pool house and talking me out of my panties, that is.
author: Megyn Ward
